text: With UK on course to have the worst outcomes in Europe the platitudes from Alok Sharma on #Marr were pathetic. We need to get a #VirtualParliament up & running ASAP. Lessons must be learned so mistakes aren’t repeated & we find meaningful solutions #COVID19
